original: 《 士氣 》　　兩軍對陣，都是由心志強弱驅動身體行動。　　當我方將領鼓舞士氣、斬殺敵將、斬殺敵兵，　　致全軍士氣高昂，將額外提升戰鬥傷害。
text: "Morale" 　　 When the two armies are facing each other, the physical action is driven by the strength of the mind.　　 When our generals boost morale, kill enemy generals, and kill enemy soldiers, 　　 will increase morale of the whole army and increase combat damage.
